abstract:
Approach to patients with COVID-19 disease: the procedure in Udine.
Coronavirus disease 2019 poses a serious threat to public health.
The protocol developed at the Azienda Sanitaria Universitaria Friuli Centrale (Italy) is based on clinical data, laboratory tests, chest echography and HRCT.
Several therapeutic options are considered, since patients vary in disease severity, evolution and co-morbidities and because so far there are no clear indications about therapeutic strategy based on randomized clinical trial.
In this protocol chest echography has a central role in categorizing patient status, follow-up and decision-making.
